name: Candy Apple Maker!
description:
There's nothing better than crisp apples coated with gooey, stick-to-your-teeth caramel or smooth, shiny melted candy.

Now you can build your dream Colossal Candy Apple on your iPhone or iPod Touch.

Start with the perfect Jumbo Green or Red Apple and drown it in rich and creamy caramel, milk chocolate or a traditional glossy candy coating.

Decorate! Cover it with birthday confetti sprinkles, crushed candy bar chunks, cookie pieces and all of your favorite candies and toppings. There's an endless variety of goodies to add to the outside, and fun flavors and frostings to drizzle on top. It's easy to make fancy looking, mouthwatering candy apples. Yumnumnumnum.

And just like a real candy apple, you can eat the sweet candy on the apple before eating your apple!

Life just got a little sweeter.
